title: 15 of 2013) and for the purpose of giving full effect to Commission Regulation
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Avian Influenza (Temporary
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Avian Influenza (Temporary 
Measures) (No.7) Regulations 2021 (Second Amendment) Regulations 2022 
and, subject to Regulation 3, come into operation on 13 January 2022.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited avian influenza (temporary measures) (no.7) regulation 2021 (second amendment) regulation 2022 subject regulation 3 come operation 13 january 2022

title: 15 of 2013) and for the purpose of giving full effect to Commission Regulation
heading: 2. The Avian Influenza (Temporary Measures) (No.7) Regulations 2021 are
text_raw:
2. The Avian Influenza (Temporary Measures) (No.7) Regulations 2021 are 

amended – 

(a) 

in Regulation 2, by the deletion of “and protection zone 5”, 

(b) by the deletion of Regulation 3 (a) (inserted by the Avian 
Influenza (Temporary Measures) (No.7) Regulations 2021 
(Amendment) Regulations 2022), 

(c) 

in Part 2 of Schedule 1 by the deletion of “(apart from the 
townlands situate in protection zone 5)” in each place where it 
occurs, and 

(d) by the deletion of Part 5 of Schedule 2.
text_norm: 2 avian influenza (temporary measures) (no.7) regulation 2021 amended - (a) regulation 2 deletion protection zone 5 (b) deletion regulation 3 (a) (inserted avian influenza (temporary measures) (no.7) regulation 2021 (amendment) regulation 2022) (c) part 2 schedule 1 deletion (apart townlands situate protection zone 5) place occurs (d) deletion part 5 schedule 2

title: 15 of 2013) and for the purpose of giving full effect to Commission Regulation
heading: 3. From 16 January 2022, the Avian Influenza (Temporary Measures)
text_raw:
3. From 16 January 2022, the Avian Influenza (Temporary Measures) 
(No.7) Regulations 2021 are amended by the deletion of Part 1 (inserted by the 
Avian Influenza (Temporary Measures) (No.7) Regulations 2021 (Amendment) 
Regulations 2022) and Part 3 of Schedule 1. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Minister for 
Agriculture, Food and the Marine, 

12 January, 2022. 

JUNE FANNING, 

An officer authorised to authenticate the Seal of the 
Minister. 

1 O.J, L 174 of 3.6.2020, 64; http://data.europa.eu/eli/reg_del/2020/687/oj 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 14th January, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [12] 3

title: 15 of 2013) and for the purpose of giving full effect to Commission Regulation
heading: (This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

These Regulations provide for the removal of certain temporary measures 
formerly in place to combat the threat posed by avian influenza. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [12]
